participant_1.background:
My family is always there for me, and I do my best to be there for them too.
i am a student at a small community college.
i m allergic to shellfish.
i love to read romance novels.
I'm so excited to start my new life in San Diego, and I'm so grateful for my family's support.

participant_2.background:
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.
i have a long drive to work.

content.text: Hey! It's going pretty well, I'm just relaxing at home. How about you?
I'm good! I'm just getting ready for my move to San Diego. I'm really excited but also a little nervous.
Oh nice! I've never been to San Diego, but I've heard great things. What made you decide to move there?
I got a job offer there as a software engineer. It's a great opportunity, and I'm really looking forward to it.
That's awesome! Congrats on the new job! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm really excited to get started.
So, what are you most looking forward to about moving to San Diego?
I'm looking forward to the weather, the beaches, and the food. I've also heard that the people there are really friendly.
All good reasons to move to San Diego! I'm sure you'll love it there.
I hope so! I'm going to miss my family and friends here, but I'm excited for this new adventure.
I'm sure you'll make new friends in San Diego. And you can always come back to visit your family and friends here.
I know, I'll definitely be back to visit.
I'm moving next week! I'm so excited!
Oh wow! That's soon! I'm sure you'll be ready for it.
I think I am! I've been packing for days.
Well, I wish you all the best in San Diego! I'm sure you'll do great.
